code: import copy from'copy-to-clipboard';import{useCallback,useEffect,useState}from'react';export default function useCopyClipboard(){let timeout=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:500;const[isCopied,setIsCopied]=useState(false);const staticCopy=useCallback(text=>{const didCopy=copy(text);setIsCopied(didCopy);},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(isCopied){const hide=setTimeout(()=>{setIsCopied(false);},timeout);return()=>{clearTimeout(hide);};}return undefined;},[isCopied,setIsCopied,timeout]);return[isCopied,staticCopy];}
